recommendations.name: Mission-critical AKS Cluster With Private Networking
recommendations.pattern_name: Mission-critical AKS Cluster With Private Networking
recommendations.description: This article provides a recommended baseline infrastructure architecture to deploy an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster. It follows our design principles and aligns with AKS architectural best practices from the Azure Well-Architected Framework. The article guides multiple distinct interdisciplinary groups, like networking, security, and identity teams, when they deploy this general-purpose infrastructure.

recommendations.pattern_name: Mission-critical Article Layout With Private Networking And Caching
recommendations.description: This baseline reference architecture provides workload-agnostic guidance and recommendations for configuring Azure Local 2311 and later infrastructure, to provide a reliable platform for highly available virtualized and containerized workloads. This architecture describes the resource components and cluster design choices for the physical machines that provide local compute, storage, and networking capabilities.
